constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 149 (Thursday, September 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WILSON of Florida:
H.R. 8872.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H7883]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: LOAN Act
